tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE machinery_tracking (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_id UUID,
  location_point GEOGRAPHY(POINT),
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE location_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE machinery_locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machinery_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE machinery_status (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machinery_id INT,
    status VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE machinery_sensors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    machinery_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE machinery_routes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    machinery_id INT,
    route_description VARCHAR,
    start_location VARCHAR,
    end_location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE machinery_maintenance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machinery_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR,
    maintenance_date DATE
)
